item.title: New Cycle
item.description: Late at night a week ago, Feeling drowsy, I decided to treat myself to a used cycle for Diwali. There wasn’t any specific reason, I just always wanted a cycle from a long time plus I liked running and made the reasonable assumption I would like cycling. I initially made a list of some discounted items on Amazon like Noise Cancellation Headphones or an Air Fryer, but none of them felt right.
